title: Has a 57,000-year-old frozen wolf been discovered with fur still protected?
subtitle: It was reported that a gold miner was blowing up a frozen mud wall in Canada when he was bumping into frozen dogs.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: At the age of 57,000, the world ' s most complete wolf mummy was found with skin, fur, all in permanent freezing when a gold mine blew up a wall of frozen mud.
